thread.title: Heatwave in Rajasthan, Bikaner Recorded Hottest Day at 45.5 deg C- Republic World
thread.title_full: Heatwave in Rajasthan, Bikaner Recorded Hottest Day at 45.5 deg C- Republic World

author: Press Trust Of India
title: Heatwave in Rajasthan, Bikaner Recorded Hottest Day at 45.5 deg C- Republic World
text: Updated May 10th, 2024 at 22:02 IST Heatwave in Rajasthan, Bikaner Recorded Hottest Day at 45.5 deg C The meteorological department has issued a warning of strong dust storms in many areas of the state for the next few days [India](https://www.republicworld.com/india) - 1 min read [Press Trust Of India](/anchors-and-authors/press-trust-of-india/) Advertisement Jaipur: Most parts of [Rajasthan](https://www.republicworld.com/topics/rajasthan) witnessed scorching heat as Bikaner recorded the highest temperature of 45.5 degrees Celsius on Friday. The meteorological department has issued a warning of strong dust storms in many areas of the state for the next few days. Advertisement Due to reduction in maximum temperature during this period, some relief from the heat is expected, it said. Heat wave conditions persisted in Bikaner, Nagaur, Jodhpur, Churu, Hanumangarh and Ganganagar districts on Friday. Advertisement During this, the maximum temperature was recorded at 45.5 degrees in Bikaner, 45.2 degrees in Phalodi, 44.9 degrees in Churu, Fatehpur and Ganganagar, 44.2 degrees in Kota, 43.8 degrees in Jaisalmer, 43.6 degrees in Karauli, 43.5 degrees in Pilani, 43.4 degrees in Barmer. However, due to the influence of a circulation system over western [Rajasthan](https://www.republicworld.com/topics/rajasthan), the weather changed in the afternoon in some parts of Jodhpur, Bikaner, Ajmer, Jaipur, Bharatpur, Kota and Udaipur divisions. Advertisement Light rain accompanied by thunder also occurred at several places. The maximum day temperature in the capital Jaipur was 43 degrees Celsius but in the evening it became cloudy and strong winds started blowing. Advertisement Published May 10th, 2024 at 22:02 IST
